law.catch_line: Disposition of fees collected under KRS 367.932 to 367.972.
law.text: All fees and charges collected and paid into the State Treasury under the provisions of KRS 367.932 to 367.972 shall be credited to a revolving trust or agency fund account for the Attorney General and shall be used for the administration of KRS 367.932 to 367.972. This section does not apply to the consumer security account.
law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 116, sec. 26, effective July 13, 1984.
